summary: An Ordinance authorizing the Mayor and City Comptroller to issue Local Improvement Bonds for the improvement of Eighteenth Avenue North from the South line of East Roy Street to the North line of East Galer Street et al, in the City of Seattle, by the installation of a system of lights et al under Ordinance No. 21598, creating Local Improvement District No. 2143 prescribing the rate of interest thereon and authorizing their delivery to the contractor constructing the improvement.
